title: Welcome To Grand Theft Democracy
body:
Hello and welcome to Grand Theft Democracy,

 This is an educational game directed at showing how Russia interferes with democratic countries around the globe. You play the role of Putin instructing the FSB on taking measures against the fictional country of Democristan in order to get a specific Russian aligned candidate elected.
 This Email box will be used to provide you with important information as you progress through the game.
The Map button will show the current poll results of Democristan. 
The Echo button will open a mock social media app that will update with story and flavor text as you progress. 
The Calendar button opens a calendar which shows all of the major events of the election, this is where interference happens, to start simply click on an event and you will start a minigame.  
The Timeline button will record your actions in the Calendar and show you how well you are doing.

Good Luck.

title: Interference with Democristan
body:
Good Evening Putin, 

 As you may be aware, that pesky country of Democristan on our borders is beginning their election period soon, this being only their second election after they seceded from Russia, they are at risk of manipulation from us in order to make sure they don’t get out of hand.  They are backed by the United States so we must act discreetly. It is up to us to ensure the greatness of Russia to continue on, and we won’t stand for these separatists to do as they please. In the coming months we will be relying on your guidance and instructions with how to interfere. We’ll leave it up to you to decide what the best course of action is for Russia.

Sincerely,
Director of FSB

title: Good Work
body:
Good Work Mr. Putin,

I see that you’ve already begun taking measures in interfering with Democristan. Doing the same kind of interference close together is less effective, so make sure to mix it up.  We’ll be providing new kinds of interference as the election progresses to help you stay on top of things.
We're working to get in touch with Dimitri Patrov as his stances are very sympathetic to our goals. I recommend trying to get his party elected.  This means trying to get every region to be as purple as possible, i.e. make the polls 50% liberal and 50% conservative. Good Luck. 

Sincerely,
FSB Director

title: New Measures
body:
Good Evening Mr. Putin,

I hope things are going well, our agents at the FSB have devised a new interference measure. I recommend this one for our next operation.

title: BIGgesT fAn!!!
body: Omg. I can't believe I'm talking to you right now. I love you so much. You are my idol. I hope one day I can ride on a horse with yOU!!!!

title: be careful
body: One false move and the citizens of Democristan will notice your tactics. Be careful in your choices from here one out. Demitri has eyes on him.

title: The blues embezzeling funds?
body: Click on the link to see our new article on the upcoming elections. Is the Blue side trying to trick us?: www.enews.com/blue-embezzlement.html

title: Good work
body: We are doing good work on the election currently. Looking at the map we are close to Demitri getting to where he needs to be. Keep up the good work.

title: Game Annoucement
body: Make sure you are checking all aspects of the game to keep up to date on the story and how you are empacting the country. Echos are a good way to see what people are currently feeling.

title: I lost respect...
body: I heard some nasty rumors about you Mr. Putin. I don't think I can love you as much as before if I know that you are interfering with the election process. This is a serious offense. Please tell me you would never ever do that. Please.

title: I love you once again
body: I have decided you can do no wrong and I love you again. disregard the previous email. I will believe in your purity. <3 Keep up the good work.

title: End Game
body: We are coming up on the end of the game. This is the last time you can get the citizens of Democristan on you side. Hurry up and make sure most regions are purple to secure a victory.
